summary: Sex and race change for Valdimar and Gregor, the housecarls from Hearthfire, to female Redguards. Includes Rayya.
descriptionHtml:
I'm sure not the first mod of this kind for them, but the first you can find. There are hundreds of Lydias, but the Hearthfire NPC's are seldom touched. So i put my big boy pants on and a cup of coffee (instead hot chocolate) and did it my self.
This changes the Housecarls, Valdimar and Gregor, from Heartfire to redguard woman like Rayya. Which was touched up a bit, too.

I put some perks into them. Made the mage a taser. Set their max level to 1000 (i use the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1175/?]uncapper[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22800/?]an npc uncapper[/url]). They might become overpowered later on.

If you experience neck gaps and/or colour mismatching you might want to "reset" the sisters with the console command [recycleactor]. Just take everything they carry. The reset deletes items, though follower status stays. If you have them following you, they will directly come back. Therefore it's recommended to have them follow you AND being indoor (they will just come immediately through the door).

Open console while looking at the npc
V
click on the npc
V
make sure the right npc is clicked
V
write recycleactor.

Requires:
Skyrim Legendary (all dlc)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii[/url] (main, female and male!)

Mods in pictures:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65479/?]Remodeled Armor for SeveNBase - 7B BombShell HDT TBBP by RickerHK[/url] (has it's own body meshes)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin Complexion by HHaleyy[/url]

(Edit: Corrected the link to the remodeled armor.)
author: konstrukter
